code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CountdownTimer(){const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const updateTimer=()=>{const now=new Date();const nextReset=new Date();nextReset.setUTCHours(24,0,0,0);const diff=nextReset-now;const hours=String(Math.floor(diff/(1000*60*60))).padStart(2,"0");const minutes=String(Math.floor(diff/(1000*60)%60)).padStart(2,"0");const seconds=String(Math.floor(diff/1000%60)).padStart(2,"0");setTimeLeft("".concat(hours,":").concat(minutes,":").concat(seconds));};updateTimer();const interval=setInterval(updateTimer,1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:"fixed",top:20,right:20,background:"#6c63ff",color:"#fff",padding:"10px 15px",borderRadius:"8px",fontWeight:"bold"},children:["Reset in: ",timeLeft]});}
